Honestly I'm sad with valve, so many cheaters in the game, I have a game where the guy had his back to me, shot and killed me, his screen rotated and killed everyone, and the person had a thousand hours played. Ridiculous, the game is spectacular, but unfortunately hackers have taken over the game, and valve does nothing to change that. I think it's ridiculous for players to enter so easily with a hack in csgo. I talked to a guy who was using hack, he told me he's been using it for a long time, and he's never been caught with it, and that if he was caught, he had 3+ accounts to use hacks. unbelievable. So my grade is 10 for the game, and 0 for the security team!
